sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE167220 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN , MMR_CTR_TERM_STRT_DT , LSOR_FNM , HSNG_TYPE_CL_CD , HSNG_CTR_SFL , MMR_LSRN_CTRP_ADR , MMR_CTR_TERM_END_DT , USE_AMT , MMR_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #txprDscmNoEncCntn# , #mmrCtrTermStrtDt# , #lsorFnm# , #hsngTypeClCd# , #hsngCtrSfl# , #mmrLsrnCtrpAdr# , #mmrCtrTermEndDt# , #useAmt# , #mmrDdcAmt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE167220 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN=#txprDscmNoEncCntn# , MMR_CTR_TERM_STRT_DT=#mmrCtrTermStrtDt# , LSOR_FNM=#lsorFnm# , HSNG_TYPE_CL_CD=#hsngTypeClCd# , HSNG_CTR_SFL=#hsngCtrSfl# , MMR_LSRN_CTRP_ADR=#mmrLsrnCtrpAdr# , MMR_CTR_TERM_END_DT=#mmrCtrTermEndDt# , USE_AMT=#useAmt# , MMR_DDC_AMT=#mmrDdcAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN=#txprDscmNoEncCntn# AND MMR_CTR_TERM_STRT_DT=#mmrCtrTermStrtDt#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE167220 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN=#txprDscmNoEncCntn# AND MMR_CTR_TERM_STRT_DT=#mmrCtrTermStrtDt#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN , MMR_CTR_TERM_STRT_DT , LSOR_FNM , HSNG_TYPE_CL_CD , HSNG_CTR_SFL , MMR_LSRN_CTRP_ADR , MMR_CTR_TERM_END_DT , USE_AMT , MMR_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167220 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN=#txprDscmNoEncCntn# AND MMR_CTR_TERM_STRT_DT=#mmrCtrTermStrtDt#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN , MMR_CTR_TERM_STRT_DT , LSOR_FNM , HSNG_TYPE_CL_CD , HSNG_CTR_SFL , MMR_LSRN_CTRP_ADR , MMR_CTR_TERM_END_DT , USE_AMT , MMR_DDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167220 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN DESC , MMR_CTR_TERM_STRT_DT DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE167220 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
